slide.title: Periods
slide.subtitle: Iterating over a period
slide.example:
<?php
$db = new DateTime( '2008-12-31' );
$de = new DateTime( '2009-12-31' );
$di = DateInterval::createFromDateString(
	'third tuesday of next month'
);
$dp = new DatePeriod(
	$db, $di, $de, DatePeriod::EXCLUDE_START_DATE
);
foreach ( $dp as $dt )
{
   echo $dt->format( "F jS\n" );
}
?>
